H0.text: A footprint in a rock is the best example of a fossil that scientists study to learn about extinct plants and animals.

H1.text: A seashell under water is the best example of a fossil for scientists who study fossils to learn about extinct plants and animals.

H2.text: A leaf in a mudpuddle is the best example of a fossil for scientists studying extinct plants and animals.

H3.text: A bone on top of a sand pile is the best example of a fossil that scientists study to learn about extinct plants and animals.
